snippet: Andy Murray received a knighthood in Queen Elizabeth II's New Year's Honors list on Friday, recognition from the monarch for reaching the pinnacle of tennis by winning his second Wimbledon and Olympic titles on his way to topping the rankings....
lead_paragraph: Andy Murray received a knighthood in Queen Elizabeth II's New Year's Honors list on Friday, recognition from the monarch for reaching the pinnacle of tennis by winning his second Wimbledon and Olympic titles on his way to topping the rankings.

headline.print_headline: Knighthoods for Murray and Farah in New Year's Honors List
headline.main: Knighthoods for Murray and Farah in New Year's Honors List
